I know such a categorization for feature films (which are usually 90-150 minutes): LowRes (300MB, usually RM), MidRes (700MB), HiRes (1.4-2.5 GB), DVDR (4.5GB), BDR (up to 25GB). Maybe on TPB "Handheld" is LowRes, "Movies" is "MidRes" and "Movies HiRes" is HiRes. I couldn't find any hints in forum FAQs.
